title: I bought a Kindle book for my wife, but didn't click the gift button. I don't have a Kindle, so how can I now transfer it to her? - Quora

response.answer_text: The way this happens for me usually is that I buy the ebook, when I actually wanted the hardcover, as a present. Kindle ebooks cannot be transferred between accounts. But you can return the ebook you bought, and buy it again for your wife. Have you ever sent something back to Amazon, because it was damaged, they send the wrong color, etc.? Same process. Go to your list of orders, click on the order, and choose to return the product. Choose the “bought by accident” option. You get an email that the purchase price will be refunded.
